main event: A green and white light was observed hovering between Sterling City and Garden City, Texas, changing to orange at times.
interesting points: The object was initially observed with binoculars and appeared to change colors from green to white and occasionally orange.,The sighting lasted about 6 minutes with three distinct observations of approximately 1.5 minutes each time.,Witnesses included a group of four individuals riding in the same car.,The weather conditions included scattered clouds and visibility of 15 miles.,The report suggests the object may have been an atmospheric reflection or the planet Venus.
location: Between Sterling City and Garden City, Texas
witness description: Mr. ___, 42, auto parts salesman; Mrs. ___; Mr. & Mrs. ___, age approximately 65
